revised_title: The Evolution and Impact of Genetic Systems in Plant Breeding
tldr: This article discusses the historical development of genetics and plant breeding, focusing on the conflicts and misunderstandings between pioneers like Bateson and Morgan. It highlights the importance of understanding the role of cytoplasm and chromosomes in heredity and the impact of these discoveries on plant breeding practices. The author emphasizes the need to consider both evolutionary and experimental time-scales in plant breeding and the importance of preserving genetic diversity.
